turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand. Finding stylish pieces on a budget can be tricky, but it's definitely possible! turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: That's a challenging goal within that specific budget range for new items, as ethical and sustainable production often increases costs.
